sentence.Network_en: Brahmanism and Mahayana have passed a long process of mixture and interfusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 婆罗门教与大乘佛教经过了长期融和的过程.

sentence.Network_en: He loves to research old religions such as Brahmanism.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很喜欢研究象婆罗门教这样古老的宗教.

PerfectNetExp.abs: a comparison between the god concepts of brahmanism and buddhism ., 婆罗门教与佛教神观念比较.
日神教源于祆教,而祆教则源自波斯古代文化。远古的波斯和印度原属同一个文化。在印度的波罗门教(Brahmanism)、古经吠陀(Vedas)曾屡提日神弥特拉(Mithra),同时在.
